viewprotect-desc: ViewProtect adds the ability to hide pages based on groups.
viewprotect-intro: This is the ViewProtect special page.
viewprotect-denied: You are not in the '$1' group.
viewprotectfile-success-add: $1 has been restricted to the $2 group
apihelp-query+example-param-key: Reduce the result to only one of the viewprotect properties.
apihelp-query+viewprotect-example-1: Get all the information about viewprotect.
apihelp-query+viewprotect-example-2: Get only information for the key "do"
